Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/27/2016, off Alonso Maestas (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/2016, off Jordon Tookes (KC)...
Injured on 9/25/2016 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2016, hitting .282 with 14 HR, 71 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2017, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2017, hitting .464 with 0 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2017, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2017, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2018, hitting .385 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Injured on 7/4/2018 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Seattle on 8/25/2018...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2018...
Injured on 5/4/2019 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2019, hitting .348 with 9 HR, 19 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 9/7/2019...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,850,000 through salary arbitration...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 4/5/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,850,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2021, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 9/23/2021...
Won MVP in 2021, hitting .284 with 36 HR, 118 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $7,378,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2022, hitting .409 with 2 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2022, hitting .326 with 6 HR, 28 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 5/27/2022...
Injured on 6/9/2022 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/5/2022 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
10/12/2022: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $19,500,000 per year, for 6 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2023, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2023, hitting .619 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2023, hitting .388 with 3 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2025, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2025, hitting .330 with 10 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Traded from Boston to St. Louis (B) on 2/3/2026 (Going to BOS: 1B Justin Thibodaux, 3B David Rivera, P Zackary Andreu, P Daniel Sanders. Going to SLB: 3B Joshua Akers)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2026...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 5/6/2027...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2027, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
